body.name: Bamboo 3-ply Bathroom Tissue, 220 Sheets, 12 Rolls, Ecofriendly, 100 Percent Sustainable, Hypoallergenic, Ultra Absorbent Velvety Soft, FSC Certified Bamboo Toilet
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 17 mins
features: Why 100% virgin bamboo pulp is better? Environmentally friendly right from the core to the outer packaging, NooTrees 3-ply Bathroom Rolls are made with 100 percent bamboo pulp. Its bamboo fibres are velvety soft and ultra absorbent (at least 20 percent more than wood pulp).
Our bamboo products are 100% renewable and FSC certified. This means the source comes from certified mills and farms.
Our bamboo pulps are also made without BPA’s, dyes, chemicals or fragrances.
So, play your part now to switch to our bamboo pulp products. Thank you, from the Earth.
3 Ply Bathroom Tissue, 220 Sheets, 12 Rolls, 1 Pack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smallest rolls of tp I have ever seen in my life
reviews.reviewText: I laughed out loud when I opened this package. I'd say Barbie sized but that would be a little exaggeration. Just a little though. :) I bought it because I was trying to be more earth friendly. I kept it because I am trying to be more earth friendly. This tp is not the softest, but it is the strongest I have ever purchased, which means you will use much less if you are paying attention.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love me some eco friendly toilet paper. It was strong and long lasting. There is softer out there, but this was for a great price. The 3ply seems like 5 ply to be honest. I have a septic tank and looking for all sorts of eco friendly products, and this one worked well with no issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered this product three times looking for an alternative to regular toilet paper. The first two packages were great. It’s pricey and the rolls are small, but the paper itself was quite soft and strong. I was happy! The most recent package felt like a completely different product- much rougher and even the interior cardboard roll was thicker. I thought I had ordered the wrong product. Checked my order- nope, same thing. Checked the reviews and every now and then this is mentioned but I had ignored those reviews initially. I’ll try again once more before looking for another product. If you like to gamble, this is for you! The most recent package is seriously rough. It’s like wiping with cheap paper towels. May the odds be ever in your favor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really little rolls but they go far!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these bcuz I couldn't get my regular brand (Panda) so I thought I'd try these & I was really surprised when the little rolls, and yes, they are LITTLE, last a long a** time! They're soft enough. Like somewhere between the big name softy kind & the cheap 1000 sheet kind. Literally they're right up the middle. What's puzzling is their size. I just finished my package but they're small in height & width but that little roll goes on & on & on. I would not mind buying these again. They don't fall apart (on your body) but they do break down in your toilet water. Very important for those of us who have toilets prone to clog or backup. They have no scent or perfumed roll & they're just this no frills little power house! Totally surprised me so if you're in need of TP that gets the job done, then yes go for it. I don't think you'll be disappointed at all. They lasted equally as long as my regular brand just in a smaller size! Kind magical toilet paper 🧻 🎩 🪄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They rolls were tinier than I expected them to be. They're thick and rough. The squares aren't even. Some are really small in comparison to the rest of the roll. I guess it's the price you pay for trying to be health and environmentally conscious. Also this is really expensive for what you pay for. I won't be buying this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toilet Paper For Those With Allergies
reviews.reviewText: No this isn't the softest ever toilet paper. What it is...no perfumes, nothing to irritate my bottom. As I've aged I've begun having allergies to things containing perfumes, dyes, etc. This does a good job and now I prefer it to the soft stuff. So, for the price, it's worth it to me because of my allergies and I'm giving it 5 stars. Also...It is strange but I use less of this toilet paper. Softer may also mean you use more to do the same job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Three-Ply NooTrees Versus Two-Ply Competitors
reviews.reviewText: I've now used the leading brand bamboo and bamboo-sugarcane bathroom tissue products offered within the Amazon ecosystem. Bamboo-only NooTrees is excellent toilet paper: Soft enough, absorbent enough, it doesn't irritate, it's priced similarly to bamboo-sugarcane hybrids like Caboo, and like all bathroom tissues made only of bamboo or bamboo-sugarcane, NooTrees is made from wholly sustainable and biodegradable resources.We see consumer reviews poo-pooing the fact these rolls don't last long enough, and that can be situationally true -- the bottom line is this is a three-ply roll, whereas most competitors (like Caboo) tend to be two-ply. When lining up a roll of NooTrees back to back against a roll of Caboo, they're of indistinguishable size thickness-wise. Ultimately, do you want a two-ply roll that will theoretically provide more instances of use (like Caboo), or are you consumer-loyal to 3-ply tissue and can live with the roll maybe not lasting as long (like NooTrees)?There's no doubt this is a great bamboo bath tissue, and it's just as affordable as the competition. Choose wisely!-Was this review of use to you? If so, let me know by clicking "Helpful." Cheers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best brand so far with use of a bidet
reviews.reviewText: Title says it all, this is the best one I've used so far that DOESN'T come apart as much as many other brands when wet such as with use with a bidet when drying off, with very minimal to none at all lint pieces falling off after wiping, and in general being a pretty great TP over all the other brands I've tried.Highly recommend it and now only buy from here
